item.description:
♪♪♪Mohegan Sun Party Bus with $20 VIP $$$ & Concert from Grammy Award Winners SOUL ASYLUM

SATURDAY FEB 19 - 6:15 pm to 12:15 am
Mohegan Sun Fun * Food * Music and New Friends with the CT Party Club

 

6 Hours of Food, Music, Games, Shopping and FUN – everything is included! Get on the CTPartyClub.com Party Bus for the best deal in Entertainment around for this low-priced all-inclusive adventure!

21 and over please
Play The Games - Shop - Check Out The Music - Play The Games - Shop and Mingle
-AND HAVE A GREAT TIME!

PLUS

FREE CONCERT IN THE MOHEGAN SUN WOLF DEN

Grammy Award Winners SOUL ASYLUM

You can join the group to see the Concert,
or join the group playing in the Casino

Next, you choose between playing at the Casino, Shopping, or a concert
with at the Wolf's Den at 8 pm

After the concert, enjoy Mohegan Sun until 12:15 am when our bus leaves

We have only 50 seats available on a privately chartered PARTY BUS
- so get your ticket before we sell out

ADVANCE TICKETS GUARANTEE YOUR SEAT * Only $40


TICKETS ON THE PARTY BUS ARE $50 IF ANY SEATS REMAIN
-call for availability

Visit http://www.CTPartyClu...

(860) FUN-5151
(860) 386-5151


BUS PICKUP SCHEDULE:

3:55 pm SHELTON / NEW HAVEN
Route 8 - Bridgeport Avenue (Exit 13)

4:25 pm WATERBURY
I-84 - Route 69 (Exit 23) across from Brass City Mall

4:55 pm FARMINGTON
I-84 - Fienemann Rd. (Exit 37)

5:25 pm Glastonbury - Commuter Parking Lot on Main St Routes 2 & 3, Main St. (Exit 5)
(Route 3) Exit 5 off Route 2 Across from Burger King

* YOU MUST BE ON THE BUS TO RECEIVE YOUR VIP BONUS BUCKS *

FOR COMMUTER PARKING LOT INFO - CLICK HERE

 

Concert starts at 8 pm

Visit http://www.CTPartyClu...

(860) FUN-5151
(860) 386-5151

In 1992, Soul Asylum released Grave Dancers Union, a record that would come to transform them from underground college rockers to international superstars. The first two singles off the album, "Somebody To Shove" and "Black Gold," both came in at high positions at the Modern Rock and Album Rock charts, but it was the album's third track that led them to their major breakthrough. "Runaway Train" peaked at #5 on the Billboard Hot 100, raised album sales to double-platinum level and won Soul Asylum the Grammy Award for "Best Rock Song" in 1994.

Visit http://www.SoulAsylum...

DON”T MISS THIS PARTY!!!

Be the first to know about our NEW EVENTS – Visit http://www.CTPartyClu... and sign up for our Email Newsletter
